name: TimeFactor
details:
Delay / LooperNine dual delays with dedicated mix, time and feedback controls for the two independent A and B lines. Delay types include MultiTap, Reverse, Mod, Tape, Ducked and AutoPan. Each effect can operate in stereo or dual mono or straight mono and each can have its own tempo subdivision for creative rhythmic echoes. TimeFactor also includes a Looper with variable speed and loop head/tail editing.
All the delays in TimeFactor include an LFO, Filter and a unique Xnob control, as well as an Infinite Repeat footswitch. 
100 presets
Studio quality sound
Instant Program Change
Real-time control with 10 knobs, MIDI or expression pedal
Tap Tempo and MIDI Clock Sync/Generate
True Analog Bypass
Rugged cast metal construction
Metal footswitches for instant Preset access
Mono or Stereo operation
Guitar or Line Level Inputs and Outputs

https://www.eventideaudio.com/products/stompboxes/delay-stompbox/timefactor
